title: 怎么关闭玩家的彩色字体权限
author: Kigmaidou
txt_content: 如题  我输入这个指令没用/mangdelp Builder essentials.chat.color

replies.author: 无恒
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: AncientAir丶
replies.txt_content:
无恒 发表于 2016-1-2 19:15
/mangaddp Builder -essentials.chat.color

你可以用这个指令，这个指令是给Builder权限组负的彩色字权限 ...
/mangaddp Builder -essentials.chat.color
（望采纳）

replies.author: AncientAir丶
replies.txt_content:

回复错了
